#summary Frequently asked questions
#labels Phase-Support,Featured

= I have installed !IntelliScreen and iKeyEx does not work. =
By default !IntelliScreen disabled any !MobileSubstrate extensions. To enable iKeyEx, please go to the Performance option in !IntelliScreen, then enable !UIKit-iKeyEx.

= _«some keyboard»_ does not work! Pressing the Globe brings me nothing new. =
Please go to Settings → iKeyEx → Keyboards, and add _«some keyboard»_.
